Object

Inserts an embedded object into your document, including formulas, 3D models, charts and OLE objects.

To access this command...

Choose Insert - Object


Formula

Inserts a formula into the current document. For more information open the LibreOffice Math Help.

Chart From File

Inserts a chart from within another spreadsheet or from an ODF Chart file (*.odc).

3D Model

Inserts a 3D models in the glTF format. This option is currently only available for Windows and Linux.

OLE Object

Inserts an OLE object into the current document. The OLE object is inserted as a link or an embedded object.
